headline: What Teledyne Technologies (TDY)'s ASIL-B Thermal ADAS Camera Launch Means For Shareholders
summary: Earlier this week, Teledyne FLIR OEM, a Teledyne Technologies company, launched Tura™, the first ASIL-B compliant thermal longwave infrared camera built to ISO 26262 functional safety standards for vehicle night vision, ADAS, and autonomous driving. This launch highlights Teledyne’s push deeper into automotive safety, aligning its thermal imaging know-how with stricter U.S. night-time braking regulations and OEM demand for all-weather perception. We’ll now explore how this ASIL-B compliant...
